ComicInfo.Summary: A Miniaturized Blue Ox. The Fourth Essential Component in the Most Epically Nifty Jack of Fables Story in the History of the Universe: Jack Horner wanders into Canada. Jack Frost learns about their next quest. The Page sisters wander through Manitoba. Raven and the gang continue on their journey to Fabletown. They all converge on the cave of Jack Dragon and Sam.
